snippet: Hakeem Nicks is ailing but he displayed the quickness and speed he is renowned for in making 10 catches for a team-leading 199 yards against Tampa Bay.
abstract: New York Giants wide receiver Hakeem Nicks, still recovering from a foot injury, has a big day against the Tampa Bay Buccaneers, making 10 catches for a team-leading 199 yards.
lead_paragraph: Hakeem Nicks is ailing but he displayed the quickness and speed he is renowned for in making 10 catches for a team-leading 199 yards against Tampa Bay.

headline.seo: Hakeem Nicks Leaps And Limps To Big Day For Giants
headline.main: Nicks Limps And Leaps To Big Day For Giants
headline.print_headline: Nicks Limps And Leaps To Big Day For Giants
